DOC.brief_summary: Our specific aim determine impact folic acid omega-3 supplementation severity depressive symptom among depressed adult age 65 .
DOC.brief_title: Folic Acid Omega -3 Fatty Acid Supplementation Depressed Older Adults
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 65+ ( year birth 1942 ) 2 . Depression ( define DSMIV diagnostic criterion depression : major minor depression dysthymia ) 1 . Coexisting psychiatric disorder ( except anxiety disorder ) 2 . Moderate severe cognitive impairment 3 . Current treatment anticoagulant , antithrombotics fibrinolytics 4 . Current severe angina exertion 5 . Chronic renal insufficiency 6 . Liver cirrhosis 7 . Alcohol drug abuse
